com.netflix.hystrix

Enum HystrixCommandProperties.ExecutionIsolationStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<HystrixCommandProperties.ExecutionIsolationStrategy>
      • com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixCommandProperties.ExecutionIsolationStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<HystrixCommandProperties.ExecutionIsolationStrategy>
    Enclosing class:
    HystrixCommandProperties

    public static enum HystrixCommandProperties.ExecutionIsolationStrategy
extends java.lang.Enum<HystrixCommandProperties.ExecutionIsolationStrategy>
    Isolation strategy to use when executing a HystrixCommand.

    • THREAD: Execute the HystrixCommand.run() method on a separate thread and restrict concurrent executions using the thread-pool size.
    • SEMAPHORE: Execute the HystrixCommand.run() method on the calling thread and restrict concurrent executions using the semaphore permit count.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constant and Description
      SEMAPHORE 
      THREAD
